title: Password-based Authentication Success
description: Verify that users with valid credentials can authenticate successfully using password login, receive a valid JWT token, and access the appropriate role-based dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Submit login form
Verify response contains valid JWT token
Verify user is redirected to their role-specific dashboard

title: OTP-based Authentication Success
description: Ensure users can authenticate using OTP login flow and receive valid JWT tokens with correct role assignments.

steps.description: Navigate to OTP login page
Request OTP with valid registered phone/email
Input received OTP code
Submit OTP for verification
Verify response contains valid JWT token
Verify user accesses correct role-based dashboard

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Validate system behavior when login attempts use invalid password or OTP, ensuring no token is granted and error messages appear.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email and password
Submit login form
Verify login attempt is rejected
Verify error message displayed to user

title: Role-based Route Protection
description: Verify that users cannot navigate to dashboards or pages not permitted for their role, enforcing authorization.

steps.description: Login as a user with a specific role (e.g., Patient)
Attempt to access a restricted dashboard URL (e.g., Doctor or Admin dashboard)
Verify access is denied or redirected appropriately

title: Patient Appointment Booking Flow
description: Test full patient appointment workflow: searching hospital and doctor, selecting time slot, booking appointment, receiving confirmation, and viewing appointment status.

steps.description: Login as Patient
Search for hospitals and select one
Select a doctor from the hospital
Choose available date and time slot
Submit appointment booking request
Verify appointment is created with status 'Pending Confirmation'
Login as Receptionist and confirm the appointment
Verify patient receives real-time confirmation notification and appointment status updates to 'Confirmed'
Verify doctor dashboard shows the confirmed appointment in schedule

title: Appointment Time Slot Booking Edge Cases
description: Verify system properly handles booking attempts on already occupied or invalid time slots and limits booking to allowed times.

steps.description: Login as Patient
Select a doctor and attempt booking on an already booked time slot
Verify booking is rejected with appropriate error message
Attempt booking on a time slot outside doctor's working hours
Verify booking is rejected as invalid

title: Digital Prescription Creation and Viewing
description: Verify doctors can create and save prescriptions linked to appointments and that patients can view and download their prescriptions.

steps.description: Login as Doctor
Select patient's confirmed appointment
Create new prescription with medication details, dosages, and instructions
Save prescription
Verify prescription appears in patient's medical records
Login as Patient
Verify prescription is listed under prescriptions dashboard
Download prescription document and verify content correctness

title: Lab Test Request and Report Upload Workflow
description: Test lab technician and doctor interactions: lab test request creation by doctor, sample processing by lab technician, report upload, and status notifications to patient and doctor.

steps.description: Login as Doctor
Request lab test for patient during appointment
Verify lab test request created with status 'Pending'
Login as Lab Technician
View pending lab test requests
Process sample and upload lab report
Update lab test status to 'Completed'
Verify doctor and patient receive real-time notification of report availability
Login as Patient
Verify lab report is viewable and downloadable

title: OPD Queue Management and Patient Check-in
description: Verify receptionist can manage OPD queue by confirming appointments, registering walk-ins, calling next patient, and updating queue status real-time to all dashboards.

steps.description: Login as Receptionist
Confirm patient appointments for the day
Register walk-in patients to the queue
Call next patient using queue token system
Verify OPD queue display updates in real-time on receptionist and patient dashboards
Patient checks in upon being called
Verify patient status updates to 'Checked-in' and real-time queue advances

title: IPD Patient Management: Vitals Recording and Nursing Notes
description: Ensure nurses can record patient vitals, input nursing notes, monitor patient status, and view documentation efficiently within IPD workflow.

steps.description: Login as Nurse
Select an admitted IPD patient
Record new vitals entry (temperature, blood pressure, pulse, etc.)
Verify vitals data is saved and displayed in patient's chart
Add nursing notes related to patient care
Verify nursing notes are saved and visible in clinical documentation

title: Real-Time Notification System Functionality
description: Verify that all notification types (appointments, lab reports, prescriptions, queue calls) trigger in-app alerts, sound notifications, visual indicators, and cross-tab synchronization.

steps.description: Trigger event generating a notification (e.g., appointment confirmation, lab report upload)
Verify in-app notification displayed with correct message
Verify audible notification is played
Verify notification badge updates on UI elements (e.g., NotificationBell)
Open multiple tabs logged in as same user
Verify notification state synchronizes across all tabs instantly

title: Responsive UI Across Devices and Screen Sizes
description: Test system UI responsiveness and usability on various screen sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile devices ensuring consistent user experience using Ant Design system.

steps.description: Access application on desktop with large screen
Verify layout displays full navigation menus and dashboards appropriately
Resize browser to tablet resolution
Verify UI adapts with drawer navigation and touch-friendly controls
Access application on smartphone screen size
Verify all functions accessible, forms usable, and no overflow or layout breakage occurs

title: Database Schema Data Integrity and Relations Enforcement
description: Validate that database constraints, relations (foreign keys), and validation schemas prevent invalid or corrupted data insertion across core entities like users, appointments, prescriptions, and lab reports.

steps.description: Attempt to insert appointment without valid patient or doctor user IDs
Verify database rejects insertion due to foreign key constraint
Attempt to save prescription with missing mandatory fields (e.g., medication name)
Verify validation rejects record and error is returned
Attempt to save lab report file without associated lab test request
Verify insertion fails as per schema rules

title: Performance: API and UI Response Time within Operational Thresholds
description: Ensure critical API endpoints and UI page loads meet defined maximum response times under normal load.

steps.description: Measure API response time for login, appointment booking, prescription retrieval, and notification endpoints under normal load
Verify API response time is within defined limits (e.g., <500ms)
Measure page load time for dashboards on desktop and mobile devices
Verify page rendering completes within acceptable thresholds (e.g., <1s)
Validate real-time data and notification update latency across tabs
Ensure updates propagate within 200ms

title: User Onboarding Flow Completion for Each Role
description: Validate the multi-step onboarding process for all user roles ensuring profile completion, verification, and role assignment before access to features.

steps.description: Register new user with role Patient
Complete onboarding steps: profile details, document upload, and verification
Verify user status updates to 'active' after completion
Repeat for roles: Doctor, Receptionist, Nurse, Lab Technician, Pharmacist, Hospital Admin, Radiology Technician
Verify respective onboarding UI and mandatory validations for each role

title: Billing System: Invoice Generation and Payment Processing
description: Test invoice creation for appointments and services, process payments, and verify billing records update correctly.

steps.description: Simulate completed appointment requiring billing
Generate invoice including service details and charges
Verify invoice contains correct patient, service, and price info
Initiate payment through payment modal
Verify payment is processed successfully and billing status updates to 'Paid'
